byline.contributor: Rick Rojas and Ashley Southall contributed reporting.

abstract: New York City Police Officer Wayne Isaacs is charged with second-degree murder in fatal shooting of Delrawn Small in off-duty encounter in Brooklyn; is first police officer in New York State to be prosecuted by Atty Gen Eric T Schneiderman.

keywords.value: Isaacs, Wayne (New York, NY, Police Officer)
keywords.name: persons

lead_paragraph: Wayne Isaacs, who shot another driver after a road-rage episode in July, is the first police officer to be prosecuted by the New York attorney general.
snippet: Wayne Isaacs, who shot another driver after a road-rage episode in July, is the first police officer to be prosecuted by the New York attorney general....

headline.main: Brooklyn Officer Charged With Murder and Manslaughter in Off-Duty Shooting
headline.print_headline: Brooklyn Officer Charged With Killing Man in an Off-Duty Dispute
